summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Paperboy Prince Platform MVP - all core functionality working correctly

integration_issues.issue: RSVP buttons not visible on events page when user is not logged in
integration_issues.note: This is expected behavior - RSVP requires authentication

Admin CRUD operations for posts, products, events, actions
Shop page in Coming Soon state with notify functionality
Action Center with tabs and action cards
